text: @MassiveDMG_ Right back at you.  Thanks
It was 22 years ago that I took my first bass lesson.  And now, I’m not great, but I can play the bass.  The more I practice the luckier I get. https://t.co/Pe4hTLrCR1
@xtrentacusx Thanks.  I can tell you it’s all heartfelt
@randomini Thanks.  I was just flattered and happy.
20 years ago today (which is yesterday because I’m in Australia), we started full time at the Rio.  FULL TIME.   Wow.  Time is a jet plane, it moves too fast. https://t.co/BERIkhEcBs
@The_MartinL @MrTeller I’m loving Brisbane.  If they could just open a Penn & Teller theater, I’d stay here forever.  I have a coffee shop I like and vegan gelato and good art.
@7BillionNeedles I don’t usually laugh at listening to me telling stories, but this made me laugh and you did a great job.
Our friend Dr. Ricardo Rosenkranz has a new operating theater! It’s a new home for magic and music in Chicago. Congratulations to @rhapsodytheater opening with @carisahendrix
@Gordon32278539 @MrTeller Thank you, Sir.
@CamChapman7 @MrTeller Thanks. We’re loving doing the shows down here.

2022 Best of Vegas Readers’ Choice - Best Magic Show: Penn & Teller @MrTeller 

https://t.co/e4zn0LpYmH

If you listened to ep. 814 of #PennsSundaySchool, you have an approximate understanding of what a chapbook is.

Next step: hold my chapbook, GOD IS REAL, in your hands. The only place to buy it is through the exclusive preorder package for #Random: https://t.co/Svio2X0xTt https://t.co/R51Q2wiZ30
@SumKindofGaming @MrTeller You know, you are the folks I’m picturing doing the show for.  Thanks so much.  Such nice smiles.
@mayhewp @MrTeller I’m so glad that worked for you and you still remember.  Thanks.
@CZHazard CONGRATS!!!  This makes me so happy.  I’m smiling like crazy.
@lgalligator @SteveMartinToGo Yes @stevemartintogo is always an inspiration everything he is and does.  I have other pictures but not at my fingertips.  Sorry.
@mahjongjen I never saw him but I mention him now and again and do a couple tricks based on his work.
@realJimMills @MarioMagician I’m flattered to be a part of this.
@res20stupid That was a trick.  Ponytail was cut off much later.
@tazpug Yeah.  I’ve got a whole book of that coming out.  Check out “Random”.  And thanks.
@kat63939323 @MrTeller @sydneyoperahous Thanks so much.  Yup, we’re just doing tricks.
@_rachel_gw_ @MrTeller Thanks, we’re still pinching ourselves that we’re really here with such wonderful audiences.
@iamkunaalr @MrTeller You did a great job.  I knew you would get lucky.
@DesireeAlliance Oh my goodness.  Thanks so much.  Oh goodness
@facelessreason Oh oh oh oh.  I could not love this picture more!

Hey, wanna see me as a monster?  By my buddy @ReneeFrench 

https://t.co/nWM0RGBLZl
@glammerwhammeb1 I had nothing to do with pricing but thanks anyway.  And thanks for liking the show
@richnathanson @limeybastard55 Wait one more year and cover all of Sgt Peppers.
@EmsTicTok @MrTeller Thanks for letting me know.  Let me tell you, if I blurt something, it means I just forgot the bit.
@HolliKellogg I really like that.  Thanks. I’m looking at you.
@batmanbuddy09 I don’t feel the same about any of the episodes, if I did I would be stagnant, but I’ve especially changed a lot of this one.  A lot.
@drmiketodorovic Thanks. But be careful.  It’s dangerous thinking.
@AaronImholte @SydOperaHouse It’s a pretty exciting venue. I’m looking forward.
@WendyBirdOZ @SydOperaHouse Well me too!
#Sydney we are here! Just a few days till we open at the @SydOperaHouse to start our #tour of #Australia ! https://t.co/zZcDmmtE4a
@WendyBirdOZ @MrTeller @shecky71 Thanks baby.  I’m fully jabbed.   I can handle the bugs down under just keep the spiders and snakes away.  See you soon.
Orders from Patreon members will be the first orders filled, as soon as we have all the materials ready to ship, well before the October 11 publication date.

—A signed copy of Random
—The chapbook God Is Real, comprising four brand new short stories by Penn
—A pair of custom dice themed around Penn and his book
Random is being released on October 11. My publisher, Akashic Books, has put together a limited edition preorder package available exclusively from https://t.co/8tNDbZZjGb that includes:
I’m yapping about my new book #Random on this week’s #PennsSundaySchool. It’s on pre-sale right now. Here are the deets: https://t.co/JgIQ1oWejP

From 5/26 to 7/10 Michael Carbonaro will be taking over the Penn & Teller Theater. Come see him! You can get tickets at https://t.co/yhMNhqXffu and from Ticketmaster. @MrTeller @carbonaro @RioVegas https://t.co/XPnZBOV7TT
@amateurrun I do hope you like it.  Thanks
@thisisdannyg @MrTeller Good job.  Very good job.
@TheChrisenator Alien card tricks.  The reason for their visits.

We are so happy to be on Adam Conover’s new Netflix series “The G Word.” Click here to watch: https://t.co/cKNiVhCTqS

@MrTeller @adamconover https://t.co/ngkYsPIJeq
@GiantSquidAU @SheldonGillett Yeah.  Please.  Go through the Penn & teller website and we will try to find a way.  Oh boy.
@JMHashtag @mariolopezviva @KitHoover @accesshollywood Yes.  You do need a pink vegan belt.
Tune in tonight —  @MrTeller and I are excited to be on the season finale of @YoungSheldon on @CBS! https://t.co/pdHrAQP0CH

“Young Sheldon Revealed Who Penn And Teller Will Play In The Season 5 Finale, And It's Much Grosser Than A Big Bang Theory Callback” @MrTeller @YoungSheldon 

https://t.co/Bi7wqy2Srq
@Kayta2003 Thanks.  I was startled a bit but we don’t own that word and Howie is a fine fellow.

Hey, me and my buddy, @LKrauss1 are going to be yapping in Toronto on August 9th.

https://t.co/nTeXwnxNHl
@JulieWilcoxWX Wow. It’s been a long time since I did that bit.  I enjoyed reassuring people and watching them relax.  Thanks for reminding me
@DylanKellner11 I’m there to be killed
@DylanKellner11 And did you kill me?

@Brittnee309 @MaskedSingerFOX @MrTeller Wow, that is a beautiful representation of that cute little fella.

Thanks.
@MateenStewart YOU GO, MY FRIEND.  Feels great doesn’t it????
@amateurrun @MrTeller @EmilyJillette Thanks for representing and hope to see you soon in person
@Vincent81252041 Oh dear. That’s much too complicated and nuanced for twitter and I’m in the middle of the new season of fu and have no time.  Sorry
@Joe_TheAnimal71 That means the world.  I remember you well.  Thanks.
@WayneGio @thepiff Wow, you’re going to make me cry!
@AdamCLuce @SweetMattyD @DamnedJuggler @thepiff I approve of your decoration.  Very much.  Beautiful and I’m flattered.
@Erostree That’s pretty great.  Thanks
@tstopher He was the greatest (not hitler!)
@TheMicroScoop He was the most amazing comedy artist of our lifetimes.   Thank you

Every year on this date, Gilbert sent out the same tweet.  Let’s pass it around.  

"Dear Hitler happy birthday you’re dead and the Jews run the world haha” https://t.co/Es6NpvvKKn
@Joe_KW @MrTeller It’s a funny thing to break up about.  I think you should be a little proud.  I am
@MisterBongwater I know more now!
@elfredderino @MrTeller I wish that you were right.  I’d be better
Yup, 34 years ago, we started making a movie with Arthur Penn.  How did we ever get so lucky?  @MrTeller https://t.co/JpbE4c5mLl

34 years ago today we started principle photography on “Penn & Teller Get Killed.”  The extras in the background are my mom & dad.  34 years.  Amazing.  And this week Teller and I put 4 new bits in our show and a whole new order. We’re crazier and working harder now than then. https://t.co/NFub73AE7Z
@naski68 @RealGilbertACP @RealGilbert @Franksantopadre Thanks for your kindness.  I sure didn’t explain Gilbert well, but it wasn’t for lack of love or appreciating.

A story I wrote about my friend @RealGilbert

https://t.co/1swDOF18Wx
@PolicyPitts She was wonderful.  I loved having her on stage.  Twitter will be fun for us.  Thanks.

An interview about my friend and comic genius @RealGilbert 

https://t.co/A758zoxg1d
@RealGilbert https://t.co/v0Vx7D7VFh

Gilbert — the funniest person of our lifetime is gone. It was an honor to have been near that level of genius. So goddamn fucking funny. Completely original. Goodbye you fucking genius.  Goodbye to my friend. https://t.co/vQzT6Hrj0g
@MagicByWest I have no idea.  But we sure do want it to be true.
It was 37 years ago today that we opened Off-Broadway at the Westside Arts theater.  I can no longer jump this high, but little else has changed. https://t.co/RzEqXOshj3
Penn & Teller invite Michael Carbonaro to theater-sit at Rio https://t.co/5dndfsQjEF via @reviewjournal
@leocheesehead @MaskedSingerFOX @MrTeller We have no plans right now.  I have never been to Brazil and really want to go.
@HonnyDipp @MaskedSingerFOX I’ve always had kind of a Cookie Monster vibe.
@PhxRawks Yes, it’s a band with two bass players, how can I not love them?
@MateenStewart Congrats!  You are going to love how you feel. I’m cheering for you.
@DrHorric29 @MaskedSingerFOX @FOXTV I’m so glad.  Yup, we’re the guys from Fool Us.

@benatspamerica Oh thanks.  Not many stories about that great song.  Running Elk (Rob Elk) wrote it for another band he was with and we loved it and did it.  Always a favorite to do.  I love singing “Like Fresca.”

People ask for my Vegas recommendations all the time. Here are a few of my favorites. @wsj @MacKingShow @EdoTapas @sambalatte 

https://t.co/6sqOUMI73Z
Such a blast performing with @MrTeller on #TheMaskedSinger and seeing @kenjeong! https://t.co/PFBLlyGsJw

Did you guess that @MrTeller and I were behind the #HydraMask? I hope you enjoyed it as much as we did. We just loved being on @MaskedSingerFOX! Be sure to check it our next Wednesday on @FOXTV! https://t.co/8qPZXJsVZm
It was us behind the #HydraMask! ⁦@MaskedSingerFOX⁩ will return next Wednesday on ⁦@FOXTV⁩ ! #TheMaskedSinger https://t.co/1PqkrPGO7s
@FestivalReviews Oh man.  How great is that.  I’m not that hip to his art, but I bet it’s great.
@mconradintel @MrTeller @FoolUsTV What could make me happier than this?  Thanks, so much.  And I can’t wait to be fooled by your child!
@empoweringniki @MrTeller I’m so sorry.  We have interpreters all the time.  It’s really hard to imagine how this happened.  But I’m sorry.
@WendyBirdOZ @snashedpotatoes @MrTeller I am flattered.  No lie.
@RyanMRich I think I just get red now.  I don’t look at the label.
@snashedpotatoes @MrTeller It doesn’t look like us to me but I’m flattered
@donaldavis @MrTeller We played law partners on the Drew Carey show.  I bet we could fake it.  Wow, what odd advertising for a law firm.  I guess they would specialize in gambling beefs.
@Batmengineer I’m so glad you liked it.  I remember that one.  I love doing these and hearing from you makes it ever funner.  Thanks.
@SusieToGo @MrTeller @ScienceSavesOrg Wow. How great is that?   Thanks
@BrianEmra @SweetMattyD @DamnedJuggler Enius jay
